nodes.text: Dendu was a Human male stormtrooper who was member of the Stormtrooper Corps during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 BBY, he was assigned aboard the Star Destroyer Imperator, along with the platoon led by Cadet Leader Kyle Katarn. He was a part of the battle on AX-456.

Late in the mission and already low on ammo, they inspected the comm center, where a small maintenance droid saw the Imperials and squeaked. Dendu tried to shoot it but missed, and Sergeant major Hong reprimanded Dendu for wasting precious ammo.
The stormtrooper was later killed by Rebel reinforcements.
